thread.title: Liverpool's Possible Starting XI Next Season
thread.title_full: Liverpool's Possible Starting XI Next Season

author: Alex Carter
title: Liverpool's Possible Starting XI Next Season
text:
IN Sports ON 22 Feb, 2017 Liverpool's Possible Starting XI Next Season Share on twitter Follow Us On 
Liverpool have been linked with a whole host of players ahead of next season and the Reds starting line-up could look a lot different in August. 
Joe Hart looks like he could be heading to Anfield following Manchester City's decision to allow him a move to a Premier League rival. Mario Gotze to Liverpool has been rated as 'the most likely' Reds transfer in the summer so he's in the team too. 
Left back, Fode Ballo-Toure, midfielder, Tiemoue Bakayoko and attacker Keita Balde Diao are also heavily linked with a Liverpool move and they're all included in the possible starting XI. 
Here's what the Liverpool team could look like next season:
